import React, { Component } from "react"; import NewsItem from "./NewsItem"; export class News extends Component { articles = [ { source: { id: "cnn", name: "CNN", }, author: "Aimee Lewis,Matt Foster", title: "Wrexham secures promotion in front of jubilant owners Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney -
